rooms.name: Lobby

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for seamless entertaining.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible design; includes grab bars and open layout for ease of movement.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows that enhance natural light.
Direct access to the swimming pool area, with a ramp for wheelchair accessibility.

exterior_features.name: Swimming Pool
exterior_features.description: Integrated design with surrounding landscaping in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Accessible layout, with grab bars and non-slip surfaces.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible with an adjacent ramp if needed.
Access to a private balcony featuring large windows that adhere to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
